pull.title: Monitor incoming transactions for spends by (a copy of) your own wallet

events.message: Monitor incoming transactions for spends by (a copy of) your own wallet

events.body: Reworked a bit, AddToWalletIfMine() and AddToWalletIfFromMe() and now merged into AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(), simplifying things further.

comments.body: return false?  Or is this dead code?
Return false indeed - nice catch. Fixed.
